tagDescription: Copies of Perks' Correspondence with W.S. Mackenzie King, Arthur Meighen, Robert Sir Borden and George Graham.The Letters deal with the efforts of the Georgian Bay Canal Company to receive compensation for the work performed in promoting and planning the Canal.
